project_description: A Flutter project using the Stacked architecture, featuring an onboarding flow for a luxury chauffeur service app called Gyde, with routing, dependency injection, and dialog/bottom sheet management.
architecture_overview: The application follows the Stacked architecture with separate folders for app setup, features, UI components, and utilities. It uses Stacked for state management, routing, and dependency injection. The onboarding flow consists of multiple pages with sliding transitions.

files.name: lib/app/app.dart
files.description: Defines the app structure using StackedApp annotation for routes, dependencies, bottom sheets, and dialogs. It includes routes for the onboarding flow (WelcomeView, AuthOptionsView, PhoneInputView, VerificationCodeView, EmailCollectionView, WelcomeConfirmationView, TermsConditionsView), services (BottomSheetService, DialogService, NavigationService), bottom sheets (NoticeSheet), and dialogs (InfoAlertDialog). The file structure allows for easy addition of new services, routes, bottom sheets, and dialogs using the @stacked-import, @stacked-route, @stacked-service, @stacked-bottom-sheet, and @stacked-dialog annotations.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_view.dart
files.description: The welcome page of the onboarding flow, introducing users to the Gyde app.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/auth_options_view.dart
files.description: The authentication options page, allowing users to continue with phone or email.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/phone_input_view.dart
files.description: The phone number input page for user verification.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/verification_code_view.dart
files.description: The verification code page for entering the code sent to the user's phone.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/email_collection_view.dart
files.description: The email collection page for providing tailored services.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/welcome_confirmation_view.dart
files.description: The welcome confirmation page, confirming access to Gyde services.

files.name: lib/features/onboarding/terms_conditions_view.dart
files.description: The terms and conditions page for user agreement.

files.name: lib/main.dart
files.description: The entry point of the application. Sets up the app and runs it.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The main function that runs the app

dependencies.name: stacked
dependencies.purpose: Stacked architecture for state management and routing

sequence_diagram:
@startuml
actor User
participant main
participant WelcomeView
participant AuthOptionsView
participant PhoneInputView
participant VerificationCodeView
participant EmailCollectionView
participant WelcomeConfirmationView
participant TermsConditionsView

User -> main: Launch app
main -> WelcomeView: Show welcome page
User -> WelcomeView: Click 'Get Started'
WelcomeView -> AuthOptionsView: Navigate to auth options
User -> AuthOptionsView: Choose auth method
AuthOptionsView -> PhoneInputView: Navigate to phone input
User -> PhoneInputView: Enter phone number
PhoneInputView -> VerificationCodeView: Navigate to verification code
User -> VerificationCodeView: Enter code
VerificationCodeView -> EmailCollectionView: Navigate to email collection
User -> EmailCollectionView: Enter email
EmailCollectionView -> WelcomeConfirmationView: Navigate to welcome confirmation
User -> WelcomeConfirmationView: Confirm
WelcomeConfirmationView -> TermsConditionsView: Navigate to terms and conditions
User -> TermsConditionsView: Agree
@enduml
state_management_flow: State is managed using the Stacked architecture. ViewModels handle the business logic and state for their respective views. The app.locator.dart file sets up dependency injection, while app.router.dart manages navigation between views.
navigation_flow: The application starts with main.dart, which sets up the app and runs the onboarding flow starting with WelcomeView. Navigation between onboarding pages is handled by the Stacked Router defined in app.router.dart, using sliding transitions. After completing the onboarding flow, users can access the main app features.
